WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
Maybe a good idea to make an array from the range parameter. So you can define one layout for several ranges.
 
Greetings
WorkItem.Summary: Add duplicateStyleArray method with array parameter

Comments.Message:
This is a good suggestion. Not only can one save lines of code this way, but one call to duplicateStyleArray() will be able to work much faster than two or more separate calls, thus improving speed.

Maarten, when time is ready I can carry out the changes on duplicateStyleArray() so it works fast with ranges. This is mostly a syntax problem, related to what syntax is settled on with "Cell range selection":
http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=9932
